nodes.text: The Otoh Villages was the name given to the many discrete hydrostatic bubble used for residences located in the Gungan city of Otoh Gunga on Naboo.

The Otoh Villages were the residential areas of the lake city of Otoh Gunga. Each village bubble was opaque and contained residential and commercial districts, as well as providing civic services. Radiating outwards from City Bigspace, the villages closest to the Bigspace were considered to upscale, while those farther afield were middle- to lower-class residences. .
